item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Remove this part:

if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to wild if(!CastleWars.isInCw(c)){ } else if (c.inWild()) { movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0); } else { movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0); } }

and this

                        if (!CastleWars.isInCw(c) && !c.inPits && !c.inFightCaves()
                                        && !c.inPcGame() && !c.inDT() && !c.inFunPk()
                                        && !c.inZombieCaves()) {
                                c.getItems().resetKeepItems();
                                if ((c.playerRights == 7 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS)
                                                || c.playerRights != 7) {
                                        if (!c.isSkulled && !c.isInArd()) { // what items to keep
                                                c.getItems().keepItem(0, true);
                                                c.getItems().keepItem(1, true);
                                                c.getItems().keepItem(2, true);
                                        }

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Like this?

[code] public void giveLife() {
if(CastleWars.isInCw© && !c.inPits && !c.inFightCaves()) {

		if (!CastleWars.isInCw(c) && !c.inPits && !c.inFightCaves()
				&& !c.inPcGame() && !c.inDT() && !c.inFunPk()
				&& !c.inZombieCaves()) {
			c.getItems().resetKeepItems();
			if ((c.playerRights == 7 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS)
					|| c.playerRights != 7) {
				if (!c.isSkulled && !c.isInArd()) { // what items to keep
					c.getItems().keepItem(0, true);
					c.getItems().keepItem(1, true);
					c.getItems().keepItem(2, true);
				}

if (CastleWars.isInCw©) {
if (CastleWars.getTeamNumber© == 1) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.SARA_X, Config.SARA_Y, 1);
} else {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.ZAMMY_X, Config.ZAMMY_Y, 1);
}
}
if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to wild
if(!CastleWars.isInCw©){
} else if (c.inWild()) {
movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0);
} else {
movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0);
}
}

           PlayerSave.saveGame(c);
            c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
            resetAnimation();
            c.startAnimation(-1);
            frame1();
            resetTb();
            c.isSkulled = false;
            c.attackedPlayers.clear();
            c.headIconPk = -1;
            c.skullTimer = -1;
            c.damageTaken = new int[Config.MAX_PLAYERS];
            c.getPA().requestUpdates();
            removeAllWindows();
            c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
            return;

}[/code]

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Remove the castle wars checks junk.

Under the giveLife() line add this:

if(CastleWars.isInCw(c)/* && some more checks for some more clarification**/) {

               //add your checks here for castle wars and teleport them

               PlayerSave.saveGame(c);
                c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
                resetAnimation();
                c.startAnimation(-1);
                frame1();
                resetTb();
                c.isSkulled = false;
                c.attackedPlayers.clear();
                c.headIconPk = -1;
                c.skullTimer = -1;
                c.damageTaken = new int[Config.MAX_PLAYERS];
                c.getPA().requestUpdates();
                removeAllWindows();
                c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
                return;
}

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[code] public void applyDead() {
int weapon = c.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon];
c.respawnTimer = 15;
c.isDead = false;
AchievementManager.increase(c, Achievements.Hospital);
Client o = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[c.killerId];
if (c.duelStatus != 6) {
c.killerId = findKiller();
if (o != null) {
c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
if (o.duelStatus == 5) {
o.duelStatus++;
}
if (weapon == CastleWars.SARA_BANNER
|| weapon == CastleWars.ZAMMY_BANNER) {
c.getItems().removeItem(weapon, 3);
c.getItems().deleteItem2(weapon, 1);
CastleWars.dropFlag(c, weapon);
}
if (CastleWars.isInCw©) {
c.cwDeaths += 1; // o
o.cwKills += 1;
}
if (c.playerLevel[c.playerDefence] <= 1) {
AchievementManager.increase(o, Achievements.puredestroyer);
}
if (o.wildLevel >= 40) {
AchievementManager.increase(o, Achievements.brutus);
}
if (o.getItems().getCarriedWealth() >= 100000000) {
AchievementManager.increase(o, Achievements.Bigmoney);
}
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“The Boss”)) {
AchievementManager.increase(o, Achievements.Tehpro);
}

			if (PlayerHandler.players[c.killerId].connectedFrom == PlayerHandler.players[c.playerKilled].connectedFrom) {
				c.faceUpdate(0);
				c.npcIndex = 0;
				c.playerIndex = 0;
				c.stopMovement();
				if (c.duelStatus <= 4) {
					c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
				} else if (c.duelStatus != 6) {
					c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
				}
				resetDamageDone();
				c.lastVeng = 0;
				c.vengOn = false;
				resetFollowers();
				c.attackTimer = 10;
				removeAllWindows();
				// sendFrame126("PkP: "+c.pkPoints+" K: "+c.kills+" D: "+c.deaths+"",
				// 663); demise sendframe
				c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
				return;
			}
			if (PlayerHandler.players[c.killerId].connectedFrom
					.equals(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerKilled].connectedFrom)) {
				o.sendMessage("Multiple IP detected, PK point reward removed.");
				c.faceUpdate(0);
				c.npcIndex = 0;
				c.playerIndex = 0;
				c.stopMovement();
				if (c.duelStatus <= 4) {
					c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
				} else if (c.duelStatus != 6) {
					c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
				}
				resetDamageDone();
				c.lastVeng = 0;
				c.vengOn = false;
				resetFollowers();
				c.attackTimer = 10;
				removeAllWindows();
				// sendFrame126("PkP: "+c.pkPoints+" K: "+c.kills+" D: "+c.deaths+"",
				// 663); demise sendframe
				c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
				return;
			}
			if (PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom != o.lastKilled
					&& c.duelStatus == 0) {
				o.pkPoints = (o.pkPoints + 3);
				o.sendMessage("You recieved 3 Pk-Points.");
				o.sendMessage("You have defeated "
						+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + "!");
				o.lastKilled = PlayerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom;
				o.getPA().addSkillXP(9000, 23);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(-4000, 23);
				if (o.earningPotential >= 85) {
					o.earningPotential -= 40 + Misc.random(50);
					int random = (int) (Math.random() * (xEP.length - 1));
					Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, xEP[random][0],
							c.absX, c.absY, xEP[random][1], o.playerId);
					o.sendMessage("You recieved an EP drop.");
					o.sendMessage("Your EP decreased to: "
							+ c.earningPotential + ".");
				}
			} else {
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(-4000, 23);
				o.sendMessage("You do not recieve any Pk-Points because you have killed "
						+ c.playerName + " twice in a row.");
				if (o.earningPotential >= 85) {
					o.earningPotential -= 40 + Misc.random(50);
					int random = (int) (Math.random() * (xEP.length - 1));
					Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, xEP[random][0],
							c.absX, c.absY, xEP[random][1], c.playerId);
					o.sendMessage("Your EP decreased to: "
							+ c.earningPotential + ".");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	c.faceUpdate(0);
	c.npcIndex = 0;
	c.playerIndex = 0;
	c.stopMovement();
	if (c.duelStatus <= 4) {
		c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
		c.getPA().addSkillXP(-4000, 23);
	} else if (c.duelStatus != 6 || !c.inArena()) {
		c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
		/*
		 * o.getPA().movePlayer( Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X +
		 * (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)),
		 * Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y +
		 * (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0);
		 */
	}
	resetDamageDone();
	c.DC++;
	c.KC++;
	c.specAmount = 10;
	c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon]);
	c.lastVeng = 0;
	c.vengOn = false;
	resetFollowers();
	c.attackTimer = 10;
	if (PlayerHandler.players[c.killerId].connectedFrom
			.equals(PlayerHandler.players[c.playerKilled].connectedFrom)) {
		o.sendMessage("You Don't Recieve PK Points for killing yourself!");
		c.faceUpdate(0);
		c.npcIndex = 0;
		c.playerIndex = 0;
		c.stopMovement();
		if (c.duelStatus <= 4) {
			c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");

		} else if (c.duelStatus != 6) {
			c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
		}
		resetDamageDone();
		c.lastVeng = 0;
		c.vengOn = false;
		resetFollowers();
		c.attackTimer = 10;
		removeAllWindows();
		c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
		return;
	}
}

[/code]

[code] public void giveLife() {
if (c.inBountyHunterCombat()) {
c.killerId = findKiller();
Client o = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[c.killerId];
if (o != null) {
if (o.bountyHunterTarget != c.playerId) {
o.killedWrongTarget = true;
if (o.leavePenalty > 0) {
BountyHunter.startLeavePenalty(o);
} else {
BountyHunter.startPickupPenalty(o);
}
o.rogueKill++;
} else if (o.bountyHunterTarget == c.playerId) {
o.bountyCash += BountyHunter.getPlayerReward(o);
o.killedWrongTarget = false;
o.targetKill++;
}
PlayerSave.saveGame(o);
}

		if (c.prayerActive[10]) {
			c.getItems().keepItem(0, true);
		}
		if (c.prayerActive[10]) {
			if (c.itemKeptId[0] > 0) {
				c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[0], 1);
			}
		}

		c.getItems().dropAllItems();
		c.getItems().deleteAllItems();

		c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");

		BountyHunter.resetStatics(c);
		BountyHunter.resetBountyHunter(c);
		BountyHunter.reEnterTime(c, 200);

		c.teleportToX = 3163;
		c.teleportToY = 3671;
		c.heightLevel = 0;

		c.headIconPk = -1;
		c.getPA().requestUpdates();
		return;
	}
	c.isDead = false;
	c.faceUpdate(-1);
	c.freezeTimer = 0;

	if (c.playerRights == 11) {
		for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
			c.playerLevel[i] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
		}
		c.getCombat().resetPrayers();

		c.teleportToX = 3300;
		c.teleportToY = 3300;
		PlayerSave.saveGame(c);
		c.getPA().resetTzhaar();
		requestUpdates();
		return;

	}
	if (c.duelStatus <= 4 && !c.getPA().inPitsWait()) { // if we are not in
														// a duel we must be
														// in wildy so
														// remove items
		if (!CastleWars.isInCw(c) && !c.inPits && !c.inFightCaves()
				&& !c.inPcGame() && !c.inDT() && !c.inFunPk()
				&& !c.inZombieCaves()) {
			c.getItems().resetKeepItems();
			if ((c.playerRights == 7 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS)
					|| c.playerRights != 7) {
				if (!c.isSkulled && !c.isInArd()) { // what items to keep
					c.getItems().keepItem(0, true);
					c.getItems().keepItem(1, true);
					c.getItems().keepItem(2, true);
				}
				if (c.prayerActive[10]
						|| c.curseActive[0]
						&& System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastProtItem > 700) {
					c.getItems().keepItem(3, true);
				}
				c.getItems().dropAllItems(); // drop all items
				c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); // delete all items

				if (!c.isSkulled && !c.isInArd()) { // add the kept items
													// once we finish
													// deleting and dropping
													// them
					for (int i1 = 0; i1 < 3; i1++) {
						if (c.itemKeptId[i1] > 0) {
							c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[i1], 1);
						}
					}
				}
				if (c.prayerActive[10] || c.isInArd()) { // if we have
															// protect items
					if (c.itemKeptId[3] > 0) {
						c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[3], 1);
					}
				}
			}
			c.getItems().resetKeepItems();
		} else if (c.inPits) {
			Server.fightPits.removePlayerFromPits(c.playerId);
			c.pitsStatus = 1;
		}
	}
	c.getCombat().resetPrayers();
	for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
		c.playerLevel[i] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]);
		c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
	}
	if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 2570) {
		if (c.playerLevel[3] > 0
				&& c.playerLevel[3] <= c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) / 10
				&& c.underAttackBy > 0) {
			int wildlvl = (((c.absY - 3520) / 8) + 1);
			if (wildlvl < 20) {
				c.getItems().deleteEquipment(2570, c.playerRing);
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2831, 2973, 0, "modern");
			}
		}
	}
	if (c.pitsStatus == 1) {
		movePlayer(2399, 5173, 0);
	}

if (CastleWars.isInCw©) {
if (CastleWars.getTeamNumber© == 1) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.SARA_X, Config.SARA_Y, 1);
} else {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.ZAMMY_X, Config.ZAMMY_Y, 1);
}
}
if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to wild
if(!CastleWars.isInCw©){
} else if (c.inWild()) {
movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0);
} else {
movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0);
}
}
c.isSkulled = false;
c.skullTimer = 0;
c.attackedPlayers.clear();
if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to
// wildy
movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0);
c.isSkulled = false;
c.skullTimer = 0;
c.attackedPlayers.clear();
} else if (c.inFightCaves()) {
c.getPA().resetTzhaar();
} else if (c.inDT()) {
c.getPA().resetDominion();
} else if (c.inZombieCaves()) {
c.getPA().resetZombies();
} else { // we are in a duel, respawn outside of arena
Client o = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[c.duelingWith];
if (o != null) {
o.getPA().createPlayerHints(10, -1);
if (o.duelStatus == 6) {
o.getTradeAndDuel().duelVictory();
}
}
movePlayer(
Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X
+ (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)),
Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y
+ (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0);
if (c.duelStatus != 6) { // if we have won but have died, don’t
// reset the duel status.
c.getTradeAndDuel().resetDuel();
}
}
// PlayerSaving.getSingleton().requestSave(c.playerId);
PlayerSave.saveGame©;
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
resetAnimation();
c.startAnimation(-1);
frame1();
resetTb();
c.isSkulled = false;
c.attackedPlayers.clear();
c.headIconPk = -1;
c.skullTimer = -1;
c.damageTaken = new int[Config.MAX_PLAYERS];
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
removeAllWindows();
c.tradeResetNeeded = true;

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Because of this

public boolean inWild() { Client c = (Client) this; if (isInFala() || inFunPk() || inMM() || c.inCw()) { return true; } if (absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3968 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10367) { return true; } return false; }

this line

if (isInFala() || inFunPk() || inMM() || c.inCw()) {

You are still in the wild technically to the server when you die because of this. Since the server thinks you are in the wild, then it will proceed to remove your items and respawn you at RESPAWN_X. Remove that piece of code. Also, show your giveLife() method and applyDead() method (if the problem consists).

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]

for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getCombat().resetPrayers();
c.teleportToX = Config.RESPAWN_X;
c.teleportToY = Config.RESPAWN_Y;
PlayerSave.saveGame©;
requestUpdates();
return;

	}[/code]

[/quote][/quote]

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Yeah, whenever I do this,

if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to wild if(!CastleWars.isInCw(c)){ if (c.inWild()) { movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0); } else { movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0); } } c.isSkulled = false; c.skullTimer = 0; c.attackedPlayers.clear();

It gives me 100 errors, but whenever I put the } else in front of wild, it did fix 1 problem, now castle wars doesn’t have to be in the wild to attack, it can attack wherever now. But it still sends you to the wrong place when you die.

if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to wild if(!CastleWars.isInCw(c)){ if (c.inWild()) { movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0); } else { movePlayer(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0); } }

You should already have the

part in your giveLife

so just add this under it

It’s not going to be exactly like that, but you do have it.

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

b00mz1029:

okay so I don’t need to use the applyDead() method?

applyDead() is for the killer

giveLife() is for whoever gets killed.

if (c.duelStatus <= 4) { // if we are not in a duel repawn to wild if (c.inWild()) { movePlayer(3101, 3490, 0); } else { movePlayer(3094, 3504, 0); } c.isSkulled = false; c.skullTimer = 0; c.skullIcon = -1; c.attackedPlayers.clear();

surround the

if (c.inWild()) { movePlayer(3101, 3490, 0); } else { movePlayer(3094, 3504, 0); }

part of that with

[code]if(!CastleWars.isInCw©){

}[/code]

Cause I have a feeling that’s your problem

@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Here. Refer to this method and change it around in the giveLife() method. [code=java]if (c.playerRights == 3) {
for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getCombat().resetPrayers();
c.teleportToX = Config.RESPAWN_X;
c.teleportToY = Config.RESPAWN_Y;
PlayerSave.saveGame©;
requestUpdates();
return;

	}[/code]

item.title: [Pi] Help! Lot's of information provided! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

if (CastleWars.isInCw(c) && (CastleWars.getTeamNumber(c) == 1)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2426 + Misc.random(3), 3076 - Misc.random(3), 1); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(2373 + Misc.random(3), 3131 - Misc.random(3), 1); }

That might fix the first issue, I don’t know, it’s how I would of done it, you might get some errors though.

As for the second I’d double check your coordinates.
